sect2.title: Introduction to Audio File
sect2.para: The Audio File package contains the audio file libraries and two sound file support programs. These are useful to support basic sound file formats.

sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The Audio File package contains libaudiofile libraries, audiofile-config, sfinfo and sfconvert.

sect3.title: libaudiofile library
sect3.para: The libaudiofile library is used by programs to support AIFF, AIFF-compressed, Sun/NeXT, WAV and BIC audio formats.

sect3.title: audiofile-config
sect3.para: The audiofile-config script is used during the compile process by programs linking to this library.

sect3.title: sfinfo
sect3.para: The sfinfo program displays the sound file format, audio encoding, sampling rate and duration for audio formats supported by this library.

sect3.title: sfconvert
sect3.para: The sfconvert program converts sound file formats where the original format and destination format are supported by this library.
